text:
@RandPaul @NYGovCuomo Then why do you cover for DJT?  The inept idiot who claims #COVID19 is a hoax, will probably disappear with warm weather and if it doesn’t drink bleach.  

You do know NY is actually in the US right? And the world isn’t flat.
